events.description: भारत ने पोखरण में अपना पहला परमाणु परीक्षण "स्माइलिंग बुद्धा" के नाम से सफलतापूर्वक किया।
संयुक्त राष्ट्र संघ में पहली बार एक एशियाई देश (भारत) ने रंगभेद नीति के खिलाफ आवाज़ उठाई।
The New York Stock Exchange is established under a buttonwood tree on Wall Street.
The United States Supreme Court hands down its decision in Brown v. Board of Education, declaring racial segregation in public schools unconstitutional.
The United States Senate begins its investigation into the Watergate scandal.
Wikipedia is launched, becoming one of the largest and most popular reference websites.
Barack Obama becomes the first African American to be elected President of the United States.
The World Health Organization declares COVID-19 a global pandemic.
